infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: We use your location to remind you when you're near bars or liquor stores so you can stay mindful.

infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Get Daily Motivation - plus get alerts when people like, follow, or comment on your posts. These can be configured in Settings.

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Sober Motivation uses your microphone for audio in your video messages.
